      • initialSetup

        protected void initialSetup()
        Initial setup: When the game begins each tableau pile should be dealt 4 cards and each homecell piles should be empty. After dealing is completed, any Kings should be moved to the bottom of their tableau.
        Specified by:
        initialSetup in class Deck

      • removeCard

        public boolean removeCard(Card c,
                          int Pile)
        This method is used for tableau piles. The card that is currently at the top of the tableau pile can be removed. Once a card is removed, the card following it in the pile becomes the top card and can be removed.
        Parameters:
        c - Represents a card that the user wants to remove
        Pile - Represents the pile that user wants to remove from
        Returns:
        If the user was able to remove card, returns true, if not false.

      • addCard

        public boolean addCard(Card add,
                       int Pile)
        A card can be added to a tableau pile when its value is one less than the tableau's top card (suits do not matter). However, can't add card if tableau pile is empty.
        Parameters:
        add - Represents the card that the user wants to add
        Pile - Represents the pile that the user wants to add the card to
        Returns:
        Returns true if card was added, if not return false.

      • addToHomecell

        public boolean addToHomecell(Card card,
                             int Pile)
        A card can be added to a homecell pile if it has the identical suit and a value one more than the homecell's top card. Only Aces can be added to a empty homecell pile
        Parameters:
        card - Represents the card that the user wants to add to a homecell pile
        Pile - Represents the homecell pile that the user wants to add to
        Returns:
        Returns true if a card is added, if not returns false

      • removeFromHomecell

        public boolean removeFromHomecell()
        Returns:
        If user tries to remove from Homecell, this method returns false.

      • getTableauSize

        public int getTableauSize()
        Returns:
        Gives back the number of tableau piles

      • resetTableau

        public void resetTableau()
        Used for testing empty tableau files

      • getHomecellPileSize

        public int getHomecellPileSize(int Pile)
        Parameters:
        Pile - Represents the pile that user wants to access from homecell
        Returns:
        Returns the number of cards in the given homecell pile

      • getTableauPileSize

        public int getTableauPileSize(int Pile)
        Parameters:
        Pile - Represents the pile that user wants to access from tableau
        Returns:
        Returns the number of cards in the given tableau pile
